pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 8, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, March 8, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Notes for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an event to highlight International Women's Day with Ministers Hajdu, Foote and Morneau.

Room 237C, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open for Coverage

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
